author: Rami R
title: boutique hotel, central location
text: I stayed at Pergolese for a week while attending a conference at the Palais des Congres which is 10 minutes walk away. Great alternative to the multi-national behemoths of Hyatt and Meridien attached to the conference centre. Staff were always pleasant and responsive. Room and bathroom were a good size (for Paris) and well appointed with a Nespresso machine, towel warmer, satellite TV, ultra comfortable bed. This is an intimate hotel with only six rooms per floor so it's super quiet and private. Highly recommended.
